title: Am I the only one who hates jungle plants?
body: Am I the only one who hates jungle plants? Thoughts?

replies.body: I don't hate them, I just think they're really really lame. Specially the red one. so useless.
I'm entirely indifferent to them, really.
I haven't experienced enough to tell if I hate them. What's your reason that you hate them?
you are never the only one who hates anything no matter how good or bad it is, stop asking
i think  they did a bad job with the whole jungle tbh with removing smite buffs, but i hate the plants
The red ones I am ok with but the vision and healing ones i think are just stupid. Giving more sustain and free vision sweep is to help the less skilled players. But thats an opinion of course
I think they are great and a new way to change up the jungle.
